fields.Name: Tackle
fields.Card Text: Tap one of your untapped Melee characters > Tap an untapped enemy character that has the same number of [STARS] or fewer.

fields.Name: Aerialbot Enigma
fields.Card Text:
If you have Superion on the battlefield > Do 1 damage to each enemy.

If you have 5 Aerialbots in bot mode on the battlefield and/or in your KO area > Combine them into Superion, Sky Protector. (A Combiner begins untapped, has all damage from the combined characters, and keeps 1 Upgrade in each slot.)

fields.Name: Full Loadout
fields.Card Text:
Choose one of your characters. You may play a Weapon, an Armor, and a Utility onto it.

(Your team and deck can have 25 [STARS] total.)

fields.Name: Rapid Ascent
fields.Card Text: When you put this on a Ranged character > Your opponent chooses a card from their hand and scraps it.

fields.Name: Battle Ready
fields.Card Text: Each of your characters get +1 ⚔ until end of turn for each Upgrade on it.

fields.Name: Ancient Wisdom
fields.Card Text:
Scrap the top 2 cards of your deck. Put an Action and an Upgrade scrapped this way into your hand.

You may play Unleash Potential.

fields.Name: Sentinel Enigma
fields.Card Text:
If you have Optimus Maximus on the battlefield > Scrap an enemy Weapon or Armor.

If you have 6 Sentinels in bot mode on the battlefield and/or in your KO area > Combine them into Optimus Maximus, Ultimate Defender. (A Combiner begins untapped, has all damage from the combined characters, and keeps 1 Upgrade in each slot.)

fields.Name: Extra Padding
fields.Card Text:
Tough 1 (Flip 1 more battle card when defending.)

When you play this on a character > You may play another Extra Padding.

Up to 3 Extra Paddings can fit in 1 Armor slot.

fields.Name: Cooling Vents
fields.Card Text: When you put this on a Ranged character > Repair 1 damage from it.

fields.Name: Mounted Missles
fields.Card Text:
This can be in an Armor or Utility slot.

(Your team and deck can have 25 [STARS] total.)

fields.Name: Pincer Movement
fields.Card Text: When one of your Decepticons attacks an enemy this turn > You get an extra attack this turn but only, but only with one of your other Decepticons against the same enemy.

fields.Name: Compact Shield
fields.Card Text:
Put on Autobots only.

(For each [BLACK] you flip when attacking, the attacker gets Pierce 1 until end of turn.)

fields.Name: Enemy Combat Analysis
fields.Card Text: While the upgraded character is battling an enemy that has the same number of [STARS] as it > The upgraded character has +2 [ATK] and +2 [DEF].

fields.Name: Secret Dealings
fields.Card Text: Draw a card. Then Plan 1. (You may put 1 card from your hand on top of your deck.)

fields.Name: Bumpers
fields.Card Text:
Put on Cars only.

Damage counters can't be moved from other characters to the upgraded character.

fields.Name: Enforcement Batons
fields.Card Text: When you put this on a character > Scrap an enemy Weapon.

fields.Name: Body Armor
fields.Card Text:
Put on Melee characters only.

Tough 3 (Flip 3 more battle cards when defending.)

fields.Name: Bolster
fields.Card Text:
Reveal > When one of your characters defends.

When Revealed > You may play an Armor onto the defender.

fields.Name: Callous Leadership
fields.Card Text: Move up to 5 damage counters from one of your Decepticon Leaders that has 8 [STARS] or more to one of your other characters.

fields.Name: Plasma Burst
fields.Card Text: Do 2 damage to an enemy.

fields.Name: Crude Club
fields.Card Text: The upgraded character has +1 [ATK] for each Upgrade on it.

fields.Name: Basic Combat Protocol
fields.Card Text: Bold 1 (Flip 1 more battle card when attacking.)

fields.Name: Backfire
fields.Card Text:
Reveal > When one of your Decepticons defends.

When Revealed > Do damage to the attacker equal to the number of Upgrades on that attacker.

fields.Name: Overwhelming Advantage
fields.Card Text:
For each Decepticon you have on the battlefield, Plan 1. (You may put 1 card from your hand on top of your deck.)


When one of your characters attacks this turn, if its Upgrades include at least [WHITE][ORANGE][BLACK][BLUE][GREEN] and you flip at least [WHITE][ORANGE][BLUE][GREEN] > Do 15 damage to an enemy.

fields.Name: Constructicon Enigma
fields.Card Text:
If you have Devastator on the battlefield > Repair 1 damage from him, then put a height counter on your Tower.

If you have 6 Constructicons in bot mode on the battlefield and/or in your KO area > Combine them into Devastator, Towering Warrior. (A combiner begins untapped, has all damage from the combined characters, and keeps 1 Upgrade in each slot.)

fields.Name: Reckless Charge
fields.Card Text: One of your characters gets +4 [ATK] until end of turn. At end of turn, do 3 damage to it.

fields.Name: Computer Sabotage
fields.Card Text: Your opponent chooses 3 cards from their hand and scraps the rest.

fields.Name: Steamroll
fields.Card Text:
Choose one of your characters.

When it does more than enough attack damage to KO an enemy this turn > Your opponent chooses one of their other characters and puts the extra damage on it.

fields.Name: Emergency Defense Field
fields.Card Text:
If the upgraded character defends and would take an even amount of attack damage > Instead it takes no attack damage.

When the upgraded character defends and takes no attack damage > Scrap this card.

fields.Name: Opportune Repairs
fields.Card Text:
Play this only if you had a Mercenary on your starting team.

Repair 3 damage from one of your Autobots.

fields.Name: Pep Talk
fields.Card Text: Draw 2 cards.

fields.Name: Swap Missions
fields.Card Text: Untap one of your tapped characters. Then tap one of your untapped characters.

fields.Name: Covert Armor
fields.Card Text:
Put on Melee characters only.

While the upgraded character is defending against a Specialist > The upgraded character has +1 [DEF].

fields.Name: Wedge Formation
fields.Card Text:
Repair 1 damage from one of your Melee characters.

If you have a Ranged character on the battlefield > Draw a card.

If you have a Specialist on the battlefield > Plan 1.

fields.Name: Strafing Run
fields.Card Text: Do 1 damage to each enemy.

fields.Name: Repair Bay
fields.Card Text: Repair 1 damage from each of your characters.

fields.Name: Frag Toss
fields.Card Text:
Your opponent chooses one of their characters and does 1 damage to it.

If your starting team was only Decepticons > Your opponent does 1 more damage to the chosen character.

fields.Name: Bashing Shield
fields.Card Text: When you put this on a character > Scrap an enemy Armor.

fields.Name: Dino-Chomp!
fields.Card Text: Scrap your hand. One of your Dinobots gets Bold 5 until end of turn. (Flip 5 more battle cards when attacking.)

fields.Name: Dinobot Enigma
fields.Card Text:
If you have Volcanicus on the battlefield > He gets Bold 2 until end of turn.

If you have 5 Dinobots in the bot mode on the battlefield and/or in your KO area > Combine them into Volcanicus, Fiery Champion. (A Combiner begins untapped, has all damage from the combined characters, and keeps 1 Upgrade in each slot.)

fields.Name: Combat Training
fields.Card Text:
While the upgraded character has a Weapon → It has Bold 1. (Flip 1 more battle card when attacking.)

While the upgraded character has an Armor → It has Tough 1. (Flip 1 more battle card when defending.)

fields.Name: Relentless Invasion
fields.Card Text: If you have Trypticon, Assault Base on the battlefield > Put Full-Tilt, Wipe-Out, and Brunt from your KO area onto the battlefield fully repaired. The characters put onto the battlefield this way attack this turn. At end of turn, put each of those characters that's still on the battlefield under Trypticon.

fields.Name: Medic's Protective Field
fields.Card Text:
When you put this on a character > Repair 1 damage from it.

Safeguard 3 (Can't take more than 3 damage while undamaged.)

fields.Name: New Orders
fields.Card Text: Untap one of your characters that has 6 [STARS] or fewer.

fields.Name: Energon Slingshot
fields.Card Text: When you put this on a Melee character > Do 1 damage to an enemy.

fields.Name: Photon Bomb
fields.Card Text: Do 2 damage to EACH character.

fields.Name: Ion Blaster Of Optimus Prime
fields.Card Text: Put on Optimus Prime only.

fields.Name: Peace Through Tyranny
fields.Card Text: You may KO one of your characters that has 6 [STARS] or more. If you do, take an extra turn after this one.

fields.Name: Dismantle
fields.Card Text:
Scrap an enemy Weapon or Armor.

(For each [BLACK] you flip when attacking, the attacker gets Pierce 1 until end of turn.)

fields.Name: Minor Medic Kit
fields.Card Text: The upgraded character has +2 [HP].

fields.Name: Heroism
fields.Card Text: If any of your other characters would take attack damage > Instead the upgraded character takes that damage.

fields.Name: Kinetic Intensifier Whip
fields.Card Text: When you flip the upgraded character to another mode > It gets Bold 2 until end of turn. (Flip 2 more battle cards when attacking.)

fields.Name: Calculated Strike
fields.Card Text:
One of your characters gets +2 [ATK] and Pierce 2 until end of turn.
(Do at least 2 damage when attacking, but not more than [ATK] total. Pierce numbers add together.)

fields.Name: Handheld Blaster
fields.Card Text: Bold 1 (Flip 1 more battle card when attacking.)

fields.Name: Energy Pack
fields.Card Text:
Put only on characters that 11 [STARS] or more.

The upgraded characters has +4 [HP].

fields.Name: Energized Field
fields.Card Text: While the upgraded character defends and you flip at least [ORANGE] > Do 1 damage to the attacker.

fields.Name: Heavy Landing
fields.Card Text:
Do 1 damage to an enemy.

If your Tower is 6 or higher, do 3 damage instead.

fields.Name: Underhanded Tactics
fields.Card Text: Do 1 damage to an enemy. If it's KO'd this way, repair 1 damage from one of your Decepticons.

fields.Name: System Reboot
fields.Card Text: Each player scraps their hand and draws 4 cards.

fields.Name: Energy Transfer
fields.Card Text: Move any number of damage counters from one of your characters to one of your other characters, but not enough to KO it.

fields.Name: Power Sword
fields.Card Text:
Put on Melee characters only.

Bold 3 (Flip 3 more battle cards when attacking.)

fields.Name: Tandem Targeting System
fields.Card Text: When you play this from hand → You may play a Tandem Targeting System from your scrap pile.

fields.Name: Heat Of Battle
fields.Card Text:
ALL characters get Bold 3 and Tough 3 until end of turn.
(Flip 3 more battle cards when attacking or defending.)

fields.Name: Brainstorm
fields.Card Text: You may play an Action. Then you may play another Action.

fields.Name: Leap Into Battle
fields.Card Text: One of your characters gets +3 [ATK] until end of turn.

fields.Name: Fling
fields.Card Text: Move 1 damage counter form one of your characters to an enemy.

fields.Name: Involuntary Promotion
fields.Card Text: Choose one of your characters. Return another character that has the same number of [STARS] or fewer from your KO area to the battlefield fully repaired. Move the damage counters and Upgrades from the chosen character to the returned character. Then KO the chosen character.

fields.Name: Repurpose
fields.Card Text:
Scrap a card from your hand. Then draw 2 cards.

(For each [BLACK] you flip when attacking, the attacker gets Pierce 1 until end of turn.)

fields.Name: Equipment Enthusiast
fields.Card Text: Draw a card for each of your upgrades.

fields.Name: Static Laser of Ironhide
fields.Card Text: When the upgraded character is NOT Ironhide and it attacks > Do 2 damage to it.

fields.Name: Repurpose
fields.Card Text: Scrap an Upgrade from any character > Repair 2 damage from that character.

fields.Name: Cornered!
fields.Card Text: Choose an enemy in bot mode. Your opponent flips it to alt mode.

fields.Name: Interpret The Airwaves
fields.Card Text:
Play only if Blaster was on on your starting team.

Look at the top 5 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.

fields.Name: Firecon Flame
fields.Card Text:
Put on Firecons only.

Each of your Firecons has Bold 1.
(Flip 1 more battle card when attacking.)

fields.Name: Disruptive Entrance
fields.Card Text: Look at your opponent's hand and scrap an Action from it.

fields.Name: Plunder
fields.Card Text: Your opponent chooses 3 cards from their hand and reveals them. You scrap one of them.

fields.Name: Coup
fields.Card Text:
Reveal > When a character is KO'd.

When Revealed > Use a Bounty ability of one of your cards on the battlefield.

fields.Name: Superior Cannon
fields.Card Text:
Play this only if you've played Tech Research this turn.

Bold 4 (Flip 4 more battle cards when attacking.)

fields.Name: Emergency Maintenance
fields.Card Text: Repair 1 damage from one of your characters. If you have more [STARS] of characters in your KO area than you have on the battlefield, repair 2 more damage from that character.

fields.Name: War Of Attrition
fields.Card Text:
Your opponent chooses one of their characters and does 1 damage to it.

If this is the third War of Attrition you've played this turn > Repair 3 damage from one of your characters.

You may play another War of Attrition.

fields.Name: Swarm!
fields.Card Text: Flip a battle card for each Insecticon you began the game with. For each [ORANGE] you flip, your opponent chooses one of their characters and does 1 damage to it. For each [BLUE] you flip, repair 1 damage from one of your characters.

fields.Name: Bad Attitude
fields.Card Text: If you began the game with only Decepticon characters > Repair 1 damage from each of your characters. Then do 1 damage to each Autobot.

fields.Name: Terrifying Resilience
fields.Card Text:
Can't be put on Autobots.

Tough 2 (Flip 2 more battle cards when defending.)

fields.Name: Showing Off
fields.Card Text: Flip one of your characters to another mode. Then flip it to another mode.

fields.Name: Unconventional Flying Object
fields.Card Text: Flip one of your Spaceships to bot mode. Then flip it back to alt mode.

fields.Name: Backup Bag
fields.Card Text: If one of your cards would cause a Weapon or Armor to be scrapped from the upgraded character > Scrap this card instead.

fields.Name: Pep Talk
fields.Card Text: Draw 2 cards.

fields.Name: Medic!
fields.Card Text: Repair 2 damage from one of your characters.

fields.Name: Point-Defense System
fields.Card Text: While the upgraded character is defending against an enemy that has Pierce > Reduce that enemy's Pierce total by 2.

fields.Name: Espionage
fields.Card Text: Choose a battle icon color. Look at your opponent's hand and scrap a card that has that color icon.

fields.Name: Rapid Conversion
fields.Card Text: Flip one of your characters to its other mode.

fields.Name: Bolt Of Lightning
fields.Card Text: Do 3 damage to an enemy.

fields.Name: Swerve
fields.Card Text:
Reveal > When one of your characters in bot mode defends.

When Reveal > Flip that character to alt mode.

fields.Name: Data Bank
fields.Card Text: At the start of your turn > Draw a card.

fields.Name: Crushing Treads
fields.Card Text:
Put on Tanks only.

The upgraded character has Pierce equal to its 🛡. (Do at least 🛡 damage when attacking, but not more than ⚔ total. Pierce numbers add together.)

fields.Name: Erratic Energy Grenade
fields.Card Text:
At the start of your turn → Do 1 damage to the upgraded character.

When the upgraded character is KO'd → Do 2 damage to each enemy.

fields.Name: Reflex Circuits
fields.Card Text:
Put on Ranged characters only.

While the upgraded character is defending against a Melee enemy > The upgraded character has +1 [DEF].

fields.Name: Bombing Run
fields.Card Text: Choose an enemy character. Move 1 damage from each of your Planes to that enemy.

fields.Name: Stealthiness
fields.Card Text: Stealth (Enemies attack other characters if able.)

fields.Name: Thermal Weaponry
fields.Card Text: When the upgraded character is attacking > It has Pierce 1 that attack for each [BLUE] you flip. (Do at least 1 damage when attacking, but not more than [ATK] total. Pierce numbers add together.)

fields.Name: Daring Counterattack
fields.Card Text: Choose one of your characters > It gets +1 [ATK] until end of turn for each Autobot Mini-Cassette in your KO area. If you have Blaster on the battlefield, the chosen character also gets Pierce 6 until end of turn. (Do at least 6 damage when attacking, but not more than [ATK] total. Pierce numbers add together.)

fields.Name: Steady Shot
fields.Card Text:
One of your characters gets +2 [ATK] until end of turn.

(For each [BLACK] you flip when attacking, the attacker gets Pierce 1 until end of turn.)

fields.Name: Hidden Fortification
fields.Card Text:
Reveal > When one of your characters defends.

When Revealed > That character gets Tough 3 until end of battle.

fields.Name: Anticipation Engine
fields.Card Text: When the upgraded character attacks > Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an Action, play it.

fields.Name: Shoulder Holster
fields.Card Text:
The upgraded character has an extra Weapon slot.

When you put this on a character > Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Weapon, play it onto the upgraded character.

fields.Name: Collateral Damage
fields.Card Text: Each player choose a Weapon on one of their characters and scraps it. Each player chooses a card in their hand and scraps it.

fields.Name: Security Checkpoint
fields.Card Text: Each player reveals their hand and scraps all Upgrades from it.

fields.Name: Defensive Formation
fields.Card Text:
Reveal > When one of your characters defends.

When Revealed > Each of your characters gets +1 [DEF] until end of turn.

fields.Name: HV Electron Breacher
fields.Card Text:
Put on Decepticons only.

(For each [BLACK] you flip when attacking, the attacker gets Pierce 1 until end of turn.)

fields.Name: Protected By Metroplex
fields.Card Text: If the upgraded character would take damage → Instead your Metroplex takes that damage.

fields.Name: Swindled
fields.Card Text:
Draw 2 cards. Then scrap 2 cards from your hand.

If you began the game with only Decepticon characters > You may play an upgrade.

fields.Name: Unleash Potential
fields.Card Text: If you've played Ancient Wisdom this turn → Choose a battle card you own from outside the game that has 1 [STAR] and put it into your hand.

fields.Name: Defensive Driving
fields.Card Text: If the upgraded character would take non-attack damage from an opponent's card > Instead the upgraded character takes that much damage minus 1.

fields.Name: Special Delivery
fields.Card Text: Move 1 damage counter from one of your characters to an enemy.

fields.Name: The Bigger They Are...
fields.Card Text: One of your characters gets +2 [ATK] until end of turn.  While it's attacking an enemy that has more [STARS] than it, it gets Pierce 4. (Do at least 4 damage when attacking, but not more than Attack total. Pierce numbers add together.)

fields.Name: Toolbox
fields.Card Text: If damage would be repaired from the upgraded character > Instead repair that much damage plus 1.

fields.Name: Supercharge
fields.Card Text: One of your characters gets Bold 3 until end of turn. (Flip 3 more battle cards when attacking.)

fields.Name: Indestructible Sword
fields.Card Text: When this is scrapped from a character > Return this to your hand.

fields.Name: Increased Durability
fields.Card Text: The upgraded character has +4 [HP].

fields.Name: Device Virus
fields.Card Text: Scrap one of your Upgrades → Scrap up to 2 enemy Upgrades of the same type as your scrapped Upgrade.

fields.Name: Agility Of Bumblebee
fields.Card Text: When this is on Bumblebee and he attacks → Draw a card.

fields.Name: Bug Bomb
fields.Card Text: Put on Insecticons only. When the upgraded character is KO'd → Draw a card, scrap an enemy Upgrade, and your opponent chooses a cared from their hand and scraps it.

fields.Name: Data Pad
fields.Card Text: When the upgraded character attacks > Draw a card. Then you may put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

fields.Name: Sturdy Javelin
fields.Card Text:
While this is on a Melee character > It has +2 [ATK].

While this is on a Ranged character and it attacks > Scrap this card and do 2 damage to an enemy.

fields.Name: W-5 Gyro Blaster
fields.Card Text: When the upgraded character battles > Each player can't flip more than 2 battle cards during this battle.

fields.Name: Electrified Spikes
fields.Card Text:
Put on Dinobots only.

When the upgraded character defends and you flip at least [ORANGE][ORANGE] > Do 1 damage to the attacker.

fields.Name: Aerial Recon
fields.Card Text:
Put on Planes only.

When the upgraded character attacks or defends → Look at the top card of your deck. You may scrap it.

fields.Name: Builder's Tools
fields.Card Text:
Put on Constructicons only.

When the upgraded character attacks > Put a height counter on your tower.

fields.Name: EMP Wave
fields.Card Text: Tap ALL characters.

fields.Name: Work Overtime
fields.Card Text: If you have fewer than 4 cards in hand, draw cards equal to the difference.

fields.Name: Brainstorm
fields.Card Text: You may play an action. Then you play another action.

fields.Name: Swap Parts
fields.Card Text: Choose 2 of your characters. Swap all their Upgrades.

fields.Name: Hiding Spot
fields.Card Text:
Reveal > After your oponent chooses an attacker and before they choose a defender.

When Revealed > One of your characters gets Stealth until end of turn.
(Enemies attack other characters if able.)

fields.Name: Height Advantage
fields.Card Text: One of your Titans gets Bold 4 until end of turn. (Flip 4 more battle cards when attacking.)

fields.Name: Ultra Magnus Armor
fields.Card Text:
Put on Autobots only.

If the upgraded characater would take non-attack damage → Instead it takes that much damage minus 1.

fields.Name: Cargo Trailer
fields.Card Text: Put on Trucks only. The upgraded character has +1 ⚔ for each Cargo Trailer on it. Up to 3 Cargo Trailers can fit into its Utility slot.

fields.Name: Energon Axe
fields.Card Text:
Put on damaged characters only.

Pierce 2 (Do at least 2 damage when attacking, but no more than [ATK] total. Pierce numbers add together.)

fields.Name: New Designs
fields.Card Text: You may play an Upgrade.

fields.Name: Spinner Rims
fields.Card Text: When the upgraded character battles and you flip your first [WHITE] > Flip 1 extra battle card.

fields.Name: Battlefield Incursion
fields.Card Text: Deploy a character from under your Trypticon, Assault Base to the battlefield.

fields.Name: Rest And Relaxation
fields.Card Text:
Repair 1 damage from one of your characters.

(After each battle > You may swap 1 card from your hand with one of your flipped [GREEN] cards.)

fields.Name: Zap
fields.Card Text: Do 1 damage to an enemy.

fields.Name: Field Communicator
fields.Card Text: When you put this on a Specialist > Scrap the top card of your deck. You may play that card.

fields.Name: Decipher
fields.Card Text: For each enemy Secret Action that's face up or face down, do 1 damage to each enemy.

fields.Name: Point Position
fields.Card Text:
The upgraded character has Brave while tapped.
(Enemies attack the upgraded character if able.)

fields.Name: Incoming Transmission
fields.Card Text: Draw 2 cards. Then put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

fields.Name: Intelligence Mission
fields.Card Text: Tap one of your untapped Specialists that has 5 [STARS] or more > Draw 3 cards.

fields.Name: Reinforced Plating
fields.Card Text: Tough 2 (Flip 2 more battle cards when defending.)

fields.Name: Multi-Missile Pod
fields.Card Text:
Put on Planes or Helicopters only.
Up to 3 Multi-Missle pods can fit in 1 Weapon slot.

When the upgraded character attacks > You may scrap this. If you do, do damage to each enemy equal to the number of Multi-Missle Pods scrapped from the upgraded character this battle.

fields.Name: Multi-Mission Gear
fields.Card Text: When you put this on a Specialist > You may play an Action.

fields.Name: Battlefield Scan
fields.Card Text:
Enemies can't use Brave or Stealth this turn.
(For each [BLACK] you flip when attacking, the attacker gets Pierce 1 until end of turn.)

fields.Name: Quartermaster
fields.Card Text:
Choose one >
- More an Upgrade from one of your characters to another one.
- Put a Battle Master upgrade from your KO area onto one of your characters.

fields.Name: Smelt
fields.Card Text: Your opponent chooses one of their Upgrades and scraps it.

fields.Name: RR Disruptor Blade
fields.Card Text: When the upgraded character attacks and you don't flip a ⬛ → Scrap this card after the battle.

fields.Name: Disruption
fields.Card Text: Look at your opponent's hand and scrap an Upgrade from it.

fields.Name: Micro Capacitor
fields.Card Text: When you use the upgraded character's [TAP] ability > Untap that character and scrap this card.

fields.Name: Defensive Configuration
fields.Card Text:
The upgraded characater has an extra Armor slot.

When you put this on a character > Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an Armor, play it onto the upgraded character.

fields.Name: Take Cover
fields.Card Text:
Reveal > If one or more of your characters would take non-attack damage during your opponent's turn.

When Revealed > Instead your characters can't take non-attack damage this turn.

fields.Name: Hunker Down
fields.Card Text: Flip each of your characters from bot mode to Tank mode. Then, for each of your Tanks that isn't upgraded with an Armor, put an Armor on it from your scrap pile.

fields.Name: Ramming Speed
fields.Card Text: Scrap an enemy Upgrade.

fields.Name: Rapid Conversion
fields.Card Text: Flip one of your characters to its other mode.

fields.Name: Salvage For Parts
fields.Card Text: Scrap ALL Upgrades. Repair 1 damage from each character for each Upgrade scrapped from it.

fields.Name: Battlefield Report
fields.Card Text:
Reveal → When one of your characters defends.

When Revealed → Draw 2 Cards. Then put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

fields.Name: Crushing Size
fields.Card Text:
When you put this on a character → Scrap an enemy Utility. If you cannot, draw a card.

Pierce 1 (Do at least 1 damage when attacking, but not more than ⚔ total. Pierce numbers add together.)

fields.Name: Jam Signals
fields.Card Text:
Reveal > When your opponent plays an [BLUE] Action.

When Revealed > Scrap that Action and it has no effect.

fields.Name: Soldier's Blaster
fields.Card Text:
When the upgraded character attacks an enemy from a different faction > The upgraded character gets +2 until end of battle.
(The factions are Autobots, Decepticons, and Mercenaries.)

fields.Name: Noble's Blaster
fields.Card Text:
Put on Autobots only.

While the upgraded character is attacking a Decepticon > It has Pierce 2. (Do at least 2 damage when attacking, but not more than [ATK] total. Pierce numbers add together.)

fields.Name: Metal Detector
fields.Card Text: When the upgraded character attacks > Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an Upgrade, you may play it.

fields.Name: Hijack
fields.Card Text:
Reveal > If your opponent would draw a second card during their turn.

When Revealed > If your opponent would draw a card this turn, you draw a card instead.

fields.Name: Recover Cassette
fields.Card Text: If you have Blaster or Soundwave on the battlefield > You may put one of your Mini-Cassettes from the battlefield under it. If you do, repair 2 damage from one of your characters, then put this card into your KO area.

fields.Name: Disarm
fields.Card Text: Return all Upgrades on a character to their owner's hand.

fields.Name: Battering Ram
fields.Card Text:
Put on Trucks only.

When the upgraded character does attack damage to an enemy > Your opponent flips that enemy to its other mode.

fields.Name: Stunticon Enigma
fields.Card Text:
If you have Menasor on the battlefield > Draw 2 cards.

If you have 5 Stunticons in bot mode on the battlefield and/or your KO area > Combine them into Menasor, Menacing Colossus. (A Combiner begins untappped, has all damage from the combined characters, and keeps 1 Upgrade in each slot.)

fields.Name: Squish Them Like Bugs
fields.Card Text: Choose one of your characters. When it does attack damage this turn to an enemy that has fewer [STARS] than it > Do 1 damage to each enemy that has fewer [STARS] than your character.

fields.Name: Testify
fields.Card Text: Each player draws 2 cards.

fields.Name: Tooth And Claw
fields.Card Text:
Put on Predacons only.

The upgraded character can have a Weapon or Armor in its Armor slot.

fields.Name: Escape Route
fields.Card Text:
Flip one your characters from bot mode to alt mode.

(After each battle > You may swap 1 card from your hand with one of your flipped [GREEN] cards.)

fields.Name: Spare Parts
fields.Card Text: If an opponent's card would cause a Weapon or Armor to be scrapped from the upgraded character > Scrap this card instead.

fields.Name: Composite Armor
fields.Card Text:
Put on Tanks only.

When the upgraded characater defends > Scrap this card after the battle. Then, if you flipped at least [BLACK] that battle, do 1 damage to the attacker.

fields.Name: Vandalize
fields.Card Text:
Scrap all enemy Weapons, Armors, or Utilities.

(Your team and deck can have 25 [STARS] total.)

fields.Name: Inferno Breath
fields.Card Text: Tap one of your untapped characters that has 5 [STARS] or more > Do 3 damage to an enemy.

fields.Name: Blast Suit
fields.Card Text: If the upgraded character would take attack damage > Instead it takes half that damage rounded down, and you scrap this card.

fields.Name: Team-Up Tactics
fields.Card Text: Choose one of your characters. If it's a Truck, repair 2 damage from it. If it's a Car, draw 2 cards.

fields.Name: Start Your Engines
fields.Card Text: Flip each of your characters from bot mode to Car mode. Then untap one of your Cars.

fields.Name: Opportune Offensive
fields.Card Text:
Play this only if you had a Mercenary on your starting team.

One of your Decepticons gets +3 [ATK] and Pierce 3 until end of turn.

fields.Name: Infiltrate
fields.Card Text:
Reveal > When your opponent plays an [ORANGE] action.

When Revealed > Scrap that Action and it has no effect.

fields.Name: Combat Commands
fields.Card Text:
Put on Sentinels only.

When the upgraded character attacks > You may flip a Sentinel in your KO area from bot mode to alt mode. If you do, then flip it back to bot mode.

fields.Name: Backup Beam
fields.Card Text: Bold 2 (Flip 2 more battle cards when attacking.)

fields.Name: Blast Shield
fields.Card Text: After the upgraded character defends → Scrap this card.

fields.Name: Pocket Processor
fields.Card Text: At the start of your turn > Draw a card.

fields.Name: Inner Groove
fields.Card Text: Put on Mini-Cassettes only.

fields.Name: Handheld Blaster
fields.Card Text: Bold 1 (Flip 1 more battle card when attacking.)

fields.Name: Immersed In Shadow
fields.Card Text: The upgraded character has Stealth while untapped. (Enemies attack other characters if able.)

fields.Name: Reclaim
fields.Card Text:
Put an upgrade from your scrap pile on top of your deck.

If your Tower is 3 or higher, draw a card.

fields.Name: Overheat
fields.Card Text:
Reveal > When an enemy attacks and your opponent flips 7 or more battle cards.

When Revealed > This battle, [ORANGE] doesn't add to [ATK] and [BLACK] doesn't give Pierce.

fields.Name: Confidence
fields.Card Text:
Draw 2 cards. Then scrap 2 cards from your hand.

If you began the game with only Autobot characters > You may play an Action.

fields.Name: LV Gamma-Disruptor Launcher
fields.Card Text:
Put on Shockwave only.
Up to 2 LV Gamma-Disruptor Launchers can fit in 1 Weapon slot.

When you put this on Shockwave > Your opponent chooses a card from their hand and scraps it.

fields.Name: Fusion Cannon Of Megatron
fields.Card Text: While this is on Megatron > He has Pierce 3. (Do at least 3 damage when attacking, but not more than [ATK] value. Pierce numbers add together.)

fields.Name: Ready For Action
fields.Card Text: Untap one of your characters that has 10 [STARS] or fewer.

fields.Name: Superior Plating
fields.Card Text:
Play this only if you've played Tech Research this turn.

Tough 4 (Flip 4 more battle cards when defending.)

fields.Name: Inspiring Leadership
fields.Card Text: Draw 3 cards. Then scrap 2 cards from your hand.

fields.Name: Turbo Boosters
fields.Card Text:
Put on Cars only.

When you put this on a character > Untap that character.

fields.Name: Crowbar
fields.Card Text: When the upgraded character attacks > Scrap this card after the battle.

fields.Name: Piercing Blaster
fields.Card Text: Pierce 3 (Do at least 3 damage when attacking, but not more than [ATK] total. Pierce numbers add together.)

fields.Name: Grenade Launcher
fields.Card Text: After the upgraded character attacks > Scrap this card.

fields.Name: Bravery
fields.Card Text: Brave (Enemies attack this character if able.)

fields.Name: Pop A Wheelie
fields.Card Text:
Flip each of your characters from bot mode to Motorcycle mode.

You get an extra attack this turn, but only a Motorcycle can attack this way.

fields.Name: Adaptive Plating
fields.Card Text: When the upgraded character defends and you flip at least [WHITE] > It gets +2 [DEF] until end of battle.

fields.Name: Multi-Tool
fields.Card Text: When you put this on a Specialist > You may play an Upgrade.

fields.Name: Intercept Communications
fields.Card Text:
Play only if Soundwave was on your starting team.
Draw 2 cards.
Choose a card in your opponent's scrap pile and put it on top of their deck.

fields.Name: Step Forward
fields.Card Text:
Reveal > After your opponent chooses an attacker and before they choose a defender.

When Revealed > One of your Autobots gets Brave until end of battle. (Enemies attack it if able.)

fields.Name: Force Field
fields.Card Text: If the upgraded character would take 5 or more attack damage > Instead scrap this card and the upgraded character takes 4 attack damage.

fields.Name: Jaws Of Steel
fields.Card Text:
Put on Dinobots only.

Bold 2 (Flip 2 more battle cards when attacking.)

fields.Name: Improvised Shield
fields.Card Text: Tough 1 (Flip 1 more battle card when defending.)

fields.Name: Backup Plan
fields.Card Text: Scrap your hand. Then draw 3 cards.

fields.Name: Mining Pick
fields.Card Text:
When the upgraded character attacks > Plan 2. (Put up to 2 cards from your hand on top of your deck.)

When you put a card from your hand on top your deck > The upgraded character gets +1 [ATK] until end of turn.

fields.Name: Recon System
fields.Card Text: When the upgraded character is battling > Flip 1 more battle card. Scrap one of the cards you flipped without using its battle icons.

fields.Name: Rally The City
fields.Card Text: If you have Metroplex on the battlefield → Draw a card for each character you have on the battlefield.

fields.Name: Treasure Hunt
fields.Card Text: Scrap the top 4 cards of your deck. Pull all Upgrades scrapped this way into your hand.

fields.Name: Scoundrel's Blaster
fields.Card Text:
Put on Decepticons only.

While the upgraded character is attacking an Autobot > It has Pierce 2. (Do at least 2 damage when attacking, but not more than [ATK] total. Pierce numbers add together.)

fields.Name: Press The Advantage
fields.Card Text:
Choose one of your Autobots. It gets +2 [ATK] until end of turn.

Choose an enemy Decepticon. It gets -2 [DEF] until end of turn. (A character's [DEF] can't go below 0.)

fields.Name: Tech Research
fields.Card Text: (After each battle → You may swap 1 card from your hand with one of your flipped [GREEN] cards.)

fields.Name: Obstructive Rhythm
fields.Card Text: For each Mini-Cassette you have on the battlefield > The upgraded character has Tough 1. (Flip 1 more battle card when defending.)

fields.Name: Scrapper Gauntlets
fields.Card Text: When you put this on a character > Scrap an enemy Weapon. If you can't, draw a card.

fields.Name: Sturdy Armor
fields.Card Text:
Put on Specialists only.

While the upgraded character is defending against a Ranged enemy > The upgraded character has +1 [DEF].

fields.Name: Shock Absorbers
fields.Card Text: When the upgraded character defends and you flip an equal number of [BLUE] and [ORANGE] > Each of those [ORANGE] adds to its [DEF] total.

fields.Name: Smoke Cloak
fields.Card Text:
Tough 1 (Flip 1 more battle card when defending.)

(For each [BLACK] you flip when attacking, the attacker gets Pierce 1 until end of turn.)

fields.Name: Focus Fire
fields.Card Text:
For each Focus Fire you've played this turn > One of your characters get Bold 1 until end of turn. (Flip 1 more battle card when attacking.)

You may play another Focus Fire.

fields.Name: Universal Network Access
fields.Card Text:
Draw 3 cards.

(Your team and deck can have 25 [STARS] total.)

fields.Name: Null-Ray of Starscream
fields.Card Text: While this is on Starscream > He has Bold 2. (Flip 2 more battle cards when attacking.)

fields.Name: Surprise Attack
fields.Card Text: One of your characters gets Pierce 3 until end of turn. (Do at least 3 damage when attacking, but not more than [ATK] total. Pierce numbers add together.)

fields.Name: Improvised Shield
fields.Card Text: Tough 1 (Flip 1 more battle card when defending.)

fields.Name: Even The Score
fields.Card Text:
Reveal > When one of your Decepticons takes more than enough attack damage to be KO'd.

When Revealed > Do the extra attack damage to the attacker. Then put this card into your KO area.

fields.Name: Stunticon Swagger
fields.Card Text:
Put on Stunticons only.

Enemies can't use Bold or Tough against the upgraded character.

fields.Name: Dual Wield
fields.Card Text:
One of your characters gets an extra Weapon slot until end of turn.

If that character is a Mercernary > You may play a Weapon from your scap pile onto it.

fields.Name: Evasive Maneuvers
fields.Card Text:
Tough 3 (Flip 3 more battle cards when defending.)

After the upgraded character defends > Scrap this card.

fields.Name: Reactive Armor
fields.Card Text: When this is scrapped from a character > Scrap an enemy Armor.

fields.Name: Force Field
fields.Card Text: If the upgraded character would take 5 or more attack damage → Instead scrap this card and the upgraded character takes 4 attack damage.

fields.Name: Urban Camo
fields.Card Text: Tough 1 (Flip 1 more battle card when defending.)

fields.Name: Security Console
fields.Card Text: When the upgraded character defends > Draw a card. Then Plan 1.

fields.Name: All-Out Attack
fields.Card Text: Each of your untapped Transformers can attack this turn.

fields.Name: Personal Targeting Drone
fields.Card Text:
Pierce 1 (Do at least 1 damage when attacking, but not more than [ATK] total. Pierce numbers add together.)

When this is scrapped from a character > Scrap an enemy Utility.

fields.Name: Roll Out!
fields.Card Text: Flip each of your characters from bot mode to alt mode.

fields.Name: Flamethrower
fields.Card Text: Bold 2 (Flip 2 more battle cards when attacking.)

fields.Name: Acute Reflexes
fields.Card Text:
Focus 1 (Before flipping battle cards when battling > Look at the top card of your deck. You may scrap it.)

When the upgraded character battles and you flip at least [WHITE] > It gets +1 [ATK] and +1 [DEF] until end of battle.

fields.Name: Lucky Vest
fields.Card Text: When the upgraded character defends and you flip battle icons of at least 4 different colors > That character can't take more than 4 attack damage this battle.

fields.Name: Matrix of Leadership
fields.Card Text:
Put on Autobots only.

While this is on a Leader > Each of your other characters has +1 [ATK] and Pierce 1. (Do at least 1 damage when attacking, but not more than [ATK] total. Pierce numbers add together.)

fields.Name: Two-Pronged Attack
fields.Card Text: Choose one of your characters. If it's a Tank, your opponent chooses 2 cards from their hand and scraps them. If it's a Plane, your opponent chooses one of their characters and does 2 damage to it.

fields.Name: Heroic Team-Up
fields.Card Text: Tap one of your untapped Autobots. Add its [ATK] total to one of your untapped Autobots until end of turn.

fields.Name: Special Ops Mission
fields.Card Text: You may play a Secret Action. Then you may play another Secret Action.

fields.Name: Smokethrower
fields.Card Text:
Bold 2 (Flip 2 more battle cards when attacking.)

(For each [BLACK] you flip when attacking, the attacker gets Pierce 1 until end of turn.)

fields.Name: Debilitating Crystal
fields.Card Text: When the upgraded character attacks > Return one of the defending character's upgrades to its owners hand.

fields.Name: Attack Drone
fields.Card Text:
When you put this on a character > You play another Attack Drone.

Up to 3 Attack Drones can fit in 1 Weapon slot.

fields.Name: Hazardous Shield
fields.Card Text:
Revenge > Scrap an enemy Weapon or Armor.
(Use a character's Revenge abilities when that character is KO'd.)

fields.Name: Fog Of War
fields.Card Text:
Each player choose 2 cards from their hand and scraps the rest.

Each player with fewer than 2 cards in hand draws card equal to the difference.

fields.Name: Superior Jetpack
fields.Card Text:
Play this only if you've played Tech Research this turn.

Pierce 4 (Do at least 4 damage when attacking, but not more than [ATK] total. Pierce numbers add together.)

fields.Name: One Shall Stand, One Shall Fall
fields.Card Text: Choose one of your characters and an enemy character. Do 3 damage to each of them.

fields.Name: Medic!
fields.Card Text: Repair 2 damage from one of your characters.

fields.Name: Field Repair
fields.Card Text: Repair 1 damage from one of your characters. If it's an Autobot, Plan 1. (You may put 1 card from your hand on top of your deck.)

fields.Name: Diagnosis
fields.Card Text:
Repair 1 damage from one of your characters.

If your starting team was only Autobots > Draw a card.

fields.Name: Sparring Gear
fields.Card Text: Tough 2 (Flip 2 more battle cards when defending.)

fields.Name: Designated Target
fields.Card Text: Each of your characters get Pierce 2 until end of turn. (Do at least 2 damage when attacking, but not more than [ATK] total. Pierce numbers add together.)

fields.Name: Armed Hovercraft
fields.Card Text: When you put this on a Ranged character → Do 1 damage to each enemy.

fields.Name: Decepticon Crown
fields.Card Text:
Put on Decepticons only.

When one of your Decepticons attacks > Plan 1. (You may put 1 card from your hand on top of your deck.)

fields.Name: Sonic Scramble
fields.Card Text:
Your opponent scraps a card from their hand.

If this is the third Sonic Scramble you have played this turn > Draw 3 cards. You may play another Sonic Scramble.

fields.Name: Head-On Collision
fields.Card Text: Choose one of your characters. It gets +3 [ATK] while attacking in alt mode this turn.

fields.Name: Unflinching Courage
fields.Card Text:
Can't be put on Decepticons.

Bold 2 (Flip 2 more battle cards when attacking.)

fields.Name: Valuable Contract
fields.Card Text:
When the upgraded character does enouugh attack damage to KO an enemy > Use this card's Bounty ability.

Bounty > Choose a battle card you own from outside the game that has exactly 1 [STAR] and put it into your hand.

fields.Name: Dismantling Claw
fields.Card Text: When this is scrapped from a character > Scrap an enemy weapon.

fields.Name: Power Punch
fields.Card Text:
Bold 3 (Flip 3 more battle cards when attacking.)

After the upgraded character attacks > Scrap this card.

fields.Name: Stable Cover
fields.Card Text:
Reveal > When one of your characater defends.

When Revealed > That character gets +1 [DEF] until end of battle. The attacker can't use Pierce this battle.

fields.Name: Marksmanship
fields.Card Text: If you have a Ranged character on the battlefield > Do 2 damage to an enemy in bot mode.

fields.Name: Rock Toss
fields.Card Text:
Do 1 damage to a tapped enemy.

(For each [BLACK] you flip when attacking, the attacker gets Pierce 1 until end of turn.)

fields.Name: Conversion Engine
fields.Card Text:
Put only on a character that has more than one alt mode.

At the end of your turn > Flip the upgraded character to another mode.

fields.Name: I Still Function!
fields.Card Text: Return one of your KO'd characters that has 12 [STARS] or fewer to the battlefield, and repair 1 damage from it. At the end of turn, KO it.

fields.Name: Heavy-Handed
fields.Card Text: One of your characters gets +2 [ATK] until end of turn. While it's attacking an enemy this turn that has fewer [STARS] than it, it has Pierce 4. (Do at least 4 damage when attacking, but not more than [ATK] total. Pierce numbers add together.)

fields.Name: Dampening Field
fields.Card Text:
Reveal > When one of your characters defends.

When Revealed > Your opponent can't flip more than 4 battle cards during this battle.

fields.Name: Inverted
fields.Card Text: When the upgraded character is battling > Each [ORANGE] you flip becomes a [BLUE]. Each [BLUE] you flip becomes an [ORANGE].

fields.Name: Fuel Cache
fields.Card Text:
Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. If they include at least [W][O][B], put them all into your hand. Otherwise, scrap them.

(Your team and deck can have 25[STARS] total.)

fields.Name: Cybertonium Bow
fields.Card Text: When the upgraded character attacks and you flip an equal number of [ORANGE] and [BLUE] > Each of those [BLUE] adds to its [ATK] total.

fields.Name: Fight For Position
fields.Card Text:
One of your characters gets Bold 2 until end of turn.
(Flip 2 more battle cards when attacking.)

fields.Name: Guarded Posture
fields.Card Text: (A character's [ATK] can't go below zero.)

fields.Name: Master Plan
fields.Card Text: Plan 6. (Put up to 6 cards from your hand on top of your deck.)

fields.Name: Contract Contingency
fields.Card Text:
Choose one of your characters. It gets +2 [ATK] until end of turn.

When the chosen character does 4 or more attack damage to an enemy this turn without KO'ing it > Use one of the chosen character's Bounty abilities.

fields.Name: 4-Wheel Drive
fields.Card Text: Choose one of your characters. Until end of turn, its base [ATK] is 7 as long as it's a Truck.

fields.Name: Combat Dagger
fields.Card Text:
Bold 1 (Flip 1 more battle card when attacking.)

(For each [BLACK] you flip when attacking, the attacker gets Pierce 1 until end of turn.)

fields.Name: Sabotaged Armaments
fields.Card Text:
Reveal > When one of your characters defends.

When Revealed > Scrap all the attacker's Weapons.

fields.Name: Predacon Enigma
fields.Card Text:
If you have Predaking on the battlefield > Draw a card. Then you may play an Upgrade.

If you have 5 Predacons in bot mode > Combine them into Predaking, Ferocious Hunter. (A Combiner begins untapped, has all damage from the combined characters, and keep 1 Upgrade in each slot.)

fields.Name: Leap Of Faith
fields.Card Text:
Scrap the top card of your deck. You may play that card.

Then scrap another card from the top of your deck. You may play that card.

(Your team and deck can have 25 [STARS] total.)

fields.Name: Vaporize
fields.Card Text: Scrap an enemy upgrade.

fields.Name: Erratic Cannon
fields.Card Text: When the upgraded character attacks and you flip at least [WHITE] > It gets +3 [ATK] until end of battle.

fields.Name: Daring Escape
fields.Card Text:
For each Autobot you have on the battlefield, put the top card of your deck into your KO area face up.

If your deck and scrap pile are empty > You win the game.

fields.Name: Scrounge
fields.Card Text: Scrap the top card of your deck. If it's an Upgrade, you may play it.

fields.Name: Crash Landing
fields.Card Text:
Put on Planes only.

When the upgraded character is KO'd during your opponent's turn > Do damage equal to its [ATK] total to a tapped enemy.

fields.Name: Buzzsaw, Ravage, Frenzy Attack!
fields.Card Text:
If you have Buzzsaw on the battlefield > Draw a card.

If you have Ravage on the battlefield > Do 1 damage to an enemy.

If you have Frenzy on that battlefield > Your opponent chooses one of their Armors and scraps it.

fields.Name: Erratic Lightning
fields.Card Text: (A character's [DEF] can't go below 0.)

fields.Name: Kinetic Converter
fields.Card Text: When you flip the upgraded character to another move > Draw a card.

fields.Name: Heroic Resolve
fields.Card Text:
Reveal > If one of your Autobots would take enough attack damage to be KO'd.

When Revealed > Instead that character takes enough attack damage to be at 1 [HP]. THen put this card in your KO area.

fields.Name: Laser Cutlass
fields.Card Text:
Put only on characters that have 7 [STARS] or fewer.

Pierce 3 (Do at least 3 damage when attacking, but not more than [ATK] total. Pierce numbers add together.)

fields.Name: Drill Arms
fields.Card Text: When you put this on a character > Scrap an enemy Armor. If you can't, draw a card.

fields.Name: Scavenge The Battlefield
fields.Card Text:
Reveal > When one of your characters is KO'd.

When Revealed > Instead of scrapping that character's Upgrades, you may put any number of them onto one of your other characters.

fields.Name: Aerialbot Formation
fields.Card Text:
Put on Aerialbots only.

The upgraded character has +1 [ATK] for each of your other tapped Aerialbots.
